author: Kate Knibbs
title: The Real Reason Veterinarians Gave a Tiger a Covid-19 Test
description: It’s hard for humans in New York City to get a test for the coronavirus. So when a Bronx Zoo tiger tested positive for Covid-19, it invited some questions.
content: Nadia had a cough. A dry cough, to be specific, and it wasnt just her. The 4-year-old Malayan tiger lives in an exhibit in the Bronx Zoo with her sister, Azul, who had also started coughing at the end of March. Altogether, seven of the zoos big cats appeared … [+5702 chars]
